resources.string: When the red border encloses the board, click OK
Do you want to undo the last move?
Do you want to finish the recording?
Fix you cellphone in a way that its camera has complete vision of the Go board. The higher the vision angle, the better.
During game recording, don\'t move the phone or the board. Even little movements can interfere. When a move is detected, a beep is emitted.
If a wrong move was detected, click on the \"undo\" button on the interface and let the app try again.
Your game will be saved in a folder called \"kifu_recorder\" in your phone\'s filesystem.

Kifu Recorder is a free app that uses your mobile device\'s camera to record Go games and only that. No personal information of the user is collected, stored or distributed in any form or means. The detected games and screenshots are stored in the mobile device itself, being the user\'s concern to take care of them.
This privacy policy can be updated in future versions of the app.
"If you have any questions about this privacy policy, contact the developer at kifurecorder@gmail.com "
Permission to access the camera was denied. This app needs to use the camera to work.
